column5: Just found out that my good friend Beans had to say fairwell to his 13 year old beagle.  My heart goes out to you my friend, you did the kindest thing that could be done but I know how much it still hurts!
Sorry to hear of this Norm... Like Cliff said you did the kindest thing you could and you gave your friend a great life l know you did
Went thru thAt with ours few years back Reflect on the good times u had together Sorry to hear
Sorry to hear this news Beansie. Pets... especially dogs... really are family.
Went thru that with ours a ways back reflect on the good times  Sorry to hear
So sorry to hear Beans. We become so attached to our friends. They are our family, and no matter how right it was to put your pet down, it still hurts real bad.
Hardest thing a man has to do is say goodbye to his best friend ..condolences
Never an easy thing to do !
Sorry to hear the bad news.  Reflect on the good times you had with your buddy.  It hurts a lot but you did the right thing.
~~~~real sad to hear that Beans, I had lost my Sheltie just before Christmas
So sorry for your loss Beans I have been through this a few times it is not an easy thing to do.

Thanks for the kind words guys...it seems strange not having those sad eyes staring at me when I'm eating (gimme some, gimme some, gimme some)...Didn't think I would miss that but I do...  We got Chiquita five years ago...She was my sister-in-law's dog but Lee was dying of cancer and the dog was going to the Humane Society...She would have had a hope in hell of being adopted from there at the age of eight so we stepped up and brought her here...  I like to think Aunty Lee was waiting for her at that Rainbow Bridge with some cheese (Chiquita's favorite treat)...

Thanks for the kind words guys...it seems strange not having those sad eyes staring at me when I'm eating (gimme some, gimme some, gimme some)...Didn't think I would miss that but I do...  We got Chiquita five years ago...She was my sister-in-law's dog but Lee was dying of cancer and the dog was going to the Humane Society...She would have had a hope in hell of being adopted from there at the age of eight so we stepped up and brought her here...  I like to think Aunty Lee was waiting for her at that Rainbow Bridge with some cheese (Chiquita's favorite treat)... You are agood man Norm.. you gave her extended care and love
Sorry to hear about your loss Beans. Our fur babies really become a part of us. Take care.
I am sorry to hear about your loss .
Sorry as well to hear Norm. I have two more coming to that age,been through this so many times,and each one never is easy.At least you gave her a fine life.
